option.helptext:
Percentage of a training point awarded each time {{Y|Cooking and Gathering}} skill is trained.
Default: {{W|33}} (0.33 point per meal).

Percentage of a training point awarded each time {{Y|Customs and Culture}} skill is trained.
Default: {{W|100}} (1.00 point per water ritual).

Percentage of a training point awarded each time {{Y|Axe}}, {{Y|Cudgel}}, {{Y|Long Blade}}, or {{Y|Short Blade}} skill is trained. For {{Y|Single Weapon Fighting}} the percentage is halved, and {{Y|Multiweapon Fighting}} it is doubled.
Default: {{W|10}} (0.10 points per hit).

Percentage of a training point awarded each time {{Y|Bow and Rifle}}, {{Y|Heavy Weapon}}, or {{Y|Pistol}} skill is trained.
Default: {{W|25}} (0.25 points per hit).

Percentage of a training point awarded each time {{Y|Physic}} skill is trained.
Default: {{W|100}} (1.00 point per bandage).

Percentage of a training point awarded each time {{Y|Deft Throwing}} skill is trained.
Default: {{W|25}} (0.25 points per hit).

Percentage of a training point awarded each time {{Y|Wayfaring}} skill is trained. Recovering from being lost is equivalent to 5 training events.
Default: {{W|15}} (0.15 points per 300 turns on the world map, 0.75 points for regaining your bearings).
